bibdata.title: TimeseriesML 1.0 – XML Encoding of the Timeseries Profile of Observations and Measurements
TimeseriesML 1.0 – XML Encoding of the Timeseries Profile of Observations and Measurements
bibdata.abstract: TimeseriesML 1.0 defines an XML encoding that implements the OGC Timeseries Profile of Observations and Measurements [OGC 15-043r3], with the intent of allowing the exchange of such data sets across information systems. Through the use of existing OGC standards, it aims at being an interoperable exchange format that may be re-used to address a range of data exchange requirements.
